name: Pat & Mat
description: New adventure game with gawky handymen from the legendary series. "Pat & Mat" is puzzle adventure game for everyone. All settings are based on the popular TV stop-motion series about "Pat & Mat", two handymen.
minimum_requirements: OS: MS Windows ® XP SP3, MS Windows ® Vista SP1, Windows ® 7 Processor: Pentium ® III / Athlon ® XP or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce nVidia GeForce 5000 / ATI Radeon 9000 or better DirectX®: DirectX®: 9.0c Hard Drive: 512MB free space
